info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:03PM EDT until July 23 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KANAWHA...ROANE AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 302 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Spencer, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Spencer, Clendenin, Kenna, Amma, Statts Mills, Harmony, Tariff, Given, Kentuck, Walton, Left Hand, Looneyville, Fairplain, Gay and Gandeeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
